title: Salt & Pepper Salmon with Cilantro Chimichurri
directions: Meanwhile, heat an oven safe skillet on the stove over medium high heat. Once the pan is hot, add the olive oil.
Season the fish liberally with salt and pepper.
Add the fish to the pan and let it cook for 90 seconds before flipping and throwing it into the oven to finish cooking through.
Place the fish in the oven and cook for 5-7 minutes. Afterwards, remove from the oven and let the fish rest for about 5 minutes before eating. Top with Chimichurri and serve.
The chimichurri is easy â€“ just dump every thing into a food processor and blend until smooth.
ingredients: 2 cups of cilantro, leaves and stems
